channel.title: Summon-Pkz; Project Czar Server
channel.description:
[i] I am currently working, on Summon-Pkz V5. Im getting pretty bored with my current server at the moment, So I have decided, for a bit of fun, and to show that Czar CAN BE GOOD (If Programmed well enough), that i am going to Create a Version of Summon-Pkz, Based off Project Czar. This Version will include ALOT of fix-ups, including Specials, Magic spells, NPC attacking, More Skills added. You won't even know It was Based off Project Czar once I am finished with it.[/i] [b]What the Server is going to include is explained in more Depth Below.[/b] [ul][li]Cities/Towns Will be Full of the NPC's that are mean't to be there.[/li] [li]Alot of NPC's will have Dialogue[/li] [li]Fixed Up special attacks (Fixing GFX's and Emotes).[/li] [li]MORE special attacks added, including GodSword specials, Dark bow special, and other weapons.[/li] [li]I am NOT using the Silab client, because, to be honest, it Fails. I will be making ANOTHER custom client to go with this server, which will have Loads of Items, NPC's, and GFX's added.[/li] [li]I am making Realistic Cities, with NPC's where they are mean't to be, Shops Like RuneScape.[/li] [li]I am going to make the Main quests for items, Like Lost City for D long And DDS, Desert Treasure for Ancients.[/li] [li]I will be making Mini-Quests, such as the Mage arena quest, Abyss quest etc.[/li] [li]NPC's that are supposed to mage WILL use magic, and with the correct emotes and Spells.[/li] [li]Will be making Full GodSword Making (Hilts, shards).[/li] [li]The Godsword Shards will be dropped By GodWar NPC's.[/li] [li]NPC attacking will be fixed, so that they attack back when you attack them.[/li] [li]Following will be added, with attacking in the wilderness too.[/li] [li]Only the Wilderness will be an area in which you can attack people (Apart from the abyss & Safe MiniGames).[/li] [li]Update on skills will be added, where you can do 'Make X' with Fletching, crafting, smithing etc.[/li] [li]NO Objects will be added, You will use Teleportation spells and walking/running to get around.[/li] [li]I will keep Client.java and other Classes to a minimum file size.[/li] [li]Going to add Castle Wars, and a Version of the Assault Minigame.[/li][/ul] [b] Those are about 20% of the things I am going to Aim to include in this server, I don't really want to list them ALL. In this Topic, I will be updating it, to tell you how Much I have progressed Each day.[/b] [size=12pt] [b][u]PROGRESS[/u][/b][/size] [u][b] Full Cities/Towns[/b][/u] Lumbridge - [size=14pt][b]80%[/b][/size] Varrock - [size=14pt][b]60%[/b][/size] Falador - [size=14pt][b]45%[/b][/size] Edgeville -[size=14pt][b] 0%[/b][/size] Ardougne - [size=14pt][b]0%[/b][/size] Draynor Village - [size=14pt][b]0%[/b][/size] Taverly - [size=14pt][b]0%[/b][/size] Catherby - [size=14pt][b]40%[/b][/size] Camelot - [size=14pt][b]10%[/b][/size] Barbarian Village - [size=14pt][b]0%[/b][/size] Canifis -[size=14pt][b] 0%[/b][/size] 13th July 2008
- Filled Lumbridge With NPC's that are mean't to be there. - Added the Prayer Master In lumbridge Church, with dialogue, and sells the Prayer Cape Once you have achieved 99 Prayer. - Added Pickpocketing for Men/Women, Guards, Warriors, Farmers, Hero's, Paladins. - Made a custom Varrock east bank (Deleted Objects, and added new ones). - Added LOTS of dialogue, including Lumbridge guide, Prayer master, Fletching master, men/women, Cook in lumb, Guards, Shop keepers and alot of others. - Made some small Fix-ups of Interfaces. - You now spawn In lumbridge and start with the RS starting kit, plus extra runes, and teletabs. - Added some wilderness NPC's. - Added 60%(ish) Wilderness levels - Need fixing up a bit. - Added about 20 New shops. - ALL NPC's (apart from bankers) Now walk Randomly in a certain area. - Added a few Door and Gate cases. - Filled Void knight Island with Void knights and Shops. - Fixed Alching - Now does Correct emote/GFX and You don't need fire runes with a fire/lava staff. - Added MORE NPC Dialogue.
8TH July 2008
- Edited Player.java so you Spawn in lumbridge with a new user. - Added a few NPC dialogues. - Made the General Store, Staff shop, and Ranging shop in varrock, with the correct items in them. - Added FULL teleportation, normal and ancients. - Added Full death, with emote. - Removed about 100kb of Rubbish out of client.java. - Deleted all NPC's and objects, apart from the men in lumbridge and the 3 shops in Varrock, adding more later. - Removed Pk points system. - Removed 'Kick' & 'Ban' Right-click options, and made the other right-click options all white, instead of white & green. - Removed some NPC drops from NPCHandler & Item & Item2.java.
7TH July 2008:
- Fixed the DDS Special Attack GFX - Fixed the Dragon LongSword Special Attack GFX - Removed Emote tab Teleports, and Replaced them with the Actual emotes. - Configured the Server Item ID's to work With my V4.5 Client. I will make another client fo this server, But I am just concentrating on improving the server at the moment.
If you feel That I have missed anything out that I could add to this, Then please keep me updated with suggestions. I will Look at all Suggestions that are Suggested, and Say whether I might add it or not, and If I think your suggestion is a good idea. [b] PICTURES:[/b] Full Normal Teleport: [img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/FullTeleport.gif[/img] Full Ancients Teleport: [img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/AncientsTele.gif[/img] Full Death: [img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Death.gif[/img]

~ Thanks, vic

item.title: Summon-Pkz; Project Czar Server
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“i_pk_pjers_i, post:12, topic:218167”]i have some questions.
will you release it to the public?
will it be anything like the old summon-pkz, like with a client with custom items and it being a pk based server etc or will it be a all-around server with items being hard to get?
also, good luck.[/quote]

Once I am finished with it, I will host it either on My computer or I will buy a dedi, and people may play it.
After a period of time after that I will release it.
And It Will have a custom client with JaGex Items and the server will be spread out across the world, with full towns/cities. The skilling will be hard, with hard combat levels, and hard cash, with many different ways to make cash.

Items won’t be spoon fed to you in shops, so for an example, you would have to get your crafting level up to craft some Dragonhide chaps for yourself, or buy them off other people.

Read full topic

item.title: Summon-Pkz; Project Czar Server
item.dc:creator: @Scyrnn Scyrnn
item.description:
@Scyrnn wrote:

please answer these questions[quote=“Scyrnn, post:4, topic:218167”]I have many questions so here they are:
*Will this be a released source?
*Will there be a client for it? (I am sure there will be since you make one of the best clients quality wise)
*Will this be a project that will be hosted in the near future?
*Is scyrnn awesome for asking so many dam questions?[/quote]

Read full topic

All people do to czar is move the home area and change the shops then Claim the server as their own. It’s bollocks.

item.title: Summon-Pkz; Project Czar Server
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:


I am currently working, on Summon-Pkz V5. Im getting pretty bored with my current server at the moment, So I have decided, for a bit of fun, and to show that Czar CAN BE GOOD (If Programmed well enough), that i am going to Create a Version of Summon-Pkz, Based off Project Czar.
This Version will include ALOT of fix-ups, including Specials, Magic spells, NPC attacking, More Skills added. You won’t even know It was Based off Project Czar once I am finished with it.

What the Server is going to include is explained in more Depth Below.

[ul][li]Cities/Towns Will be Full of the NPC’s that are mean’t to be there.[/li]
[li]Alot of NPC’s will have Dialogue[/li]
[li]Fixed Up special attacks (Fixing GFX’s and Emotes).[/li]
[li]MORE special attacks added, including GodSword specials, Dark bow special, and other weapons.[/li]
[li]I am NOT using the Silab client, because, to be honest, it Fails. I will be making ANOTHER custom client to go with this server, which will have Loads of Items, NPC’s, and GFX’s added.[/li]
[li]I am making Realistic Cities, with NPC’s where they are mean’t to be, Shops Like RuneScape.[/li]
[li]I am going to make the Main quests for items, Like Lost City for D long And DDS, Desert Treasure for Ancients.[/li]
[li]I will be making Mini-Quests, such as the Mage arena quest, Abyss quest etc.[/li]
[li]NPC’s that are supposed to mage WILL use magic, and with the correct emotes and Spells.[/li]
[li]Will be making Full GodSword Making (Hilts, shards).[/li]
[li]The Godsword Shards will be dropped By GodWar NPC’s.[/li]
[li]NPC attacking will be fixed, so that they attack back when you attack them.[/li]
[li]Following will be added, with attacking in the wilderness too.[/li]
[li]Only the Wilderness will be an area in which you can attack people (Apart from the abyss & Safe MiniGames).[/li]
[li]Update on skills will be added, where you can do ‘Make X’ with Fletching, crafting, smithing etc.[/li]
[li]NO Objects will be added, You will use Teleportation spells and walking/running to get around.[/li]
[li]I will keep Client.java and other Classes to a minimum file size.[/li]
[li]Going to add Castle Wars, and a Version of the Assault Minigame.[/li][/ul]

[b]
Those are about 20% of the things I am going to Aim to include in this server, I don’t really want to list them ALL.

In this Topic, I will be updating it, to tell you how Much I have progressed Each day.[/b]

[size=12pt]
PROGRESS[/size]


Full Cities/Towns

Lumbridge - [size=14pt]80%[/size]
Varrock - [size=14pt]60%[/size]
Falador - [size=14pt]45%[/size]
Edgeville -[size=14pt] 0%[/size]
Ardougne - [size=14pt]0%[/size]
Draynor Village - [size=14pt]0%[/size]
Taverly - [size=14pt]0%[/size]
Catherby - [size=14pt]40%[/size]
Camelot - [size=14pt]10%[/size]
Barbarian Village - [size=14pt]0%[/size]
Canifis -[size=14pt] 0%[/size]

13th July 2008

- Filled Lumbridge With NPC's that are mean't to be there. - Added the Prayer Master In lumbridge Church, with dialogue, and sells the Prayer Cape Once you have achieved 99 Prayer. - Added Pickpocketing for Men/Women, Guards, Warriors, Farmers, Hero's, Paladins. - Made a custom Varrock east bank (Deleted Objects, and added new ones). - Added LOTS of dialogue, including Lumbridge guide, Prayer master, Fletching master, men/women, Cook in lumb, Guards, Shop keepers and alot of others. - Made some small Fix-ups of Interfaces. - You now spawn In lumbridge and start with the RS starting kit, plus extra runes, and teletabs. - Added some wilderness NPC's. - Added 60%(ish) Wilderness levels - Need fixing up a bit. - Added about 20 New shops. - ALL NPC's (apart from bankers) Now walk Randomly in a certain area. - Added a few Door and Gate cases. - Filled Void knight Island with Void knights and Shops. - Fixed Alching - Now does Correct emote/GFX and You don't need fire runes with a fire/lava staff. - Added MORE NPC Dialogue.

8TH July 2008

- Edited Player.java so you Spawn in lumbridge with a new user. - Added a few NPC dialogues. - Made the General Store, Staff shop, and Ranging shop in varrock, with the correct items in them. - Added FULL teleportation, normal and ancients. - Added Full death, with emote. - Removed about 100kb of Rubbish out of client.java. - Deleted all NPC's and objects, apart from the men in lumbridge and the 3 shops in Varrock, adding more later. - Removed Pk points system. - Removed 'Kick' & 'Ban' Right-click options, and made the other right-click options all white, instead of white & green. - Removed some NPC drops from NPCHandler & Item & Item2.java.

7TH July 2008:

- Fixed the DDS Special Attack GFX - Fixed the Dragon LongSword Special Attack GFX - Removed Emote tab Teleports, and Replaced them with the Actual emotes. - Configured the Server Item ID's to work With my V4.5 Client. I will make another client fo this server, But I am just concentrating on improving the server at the moment.

If you feel That I have missed anything out that I could add to this, Then please keep me updated with suggestions. I will Look at all Suggestions that are Suggested, and Say whether I might add it or not, and If I think your suggestion is a good idea.

Full Ancients Teleport:

Full Death:

Read full topic
